short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows EventCenter WebRTC connections to use the screen as a video source.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows EventCenter WebRTC connections to use the screen as a video source. 

EventCenter – using Wowza as an engine – extends peer-to-peer audio/video transmission with server based audio/video capabilities for applications that require selective forwarding (SFU), mixing (MCU), recording, and telephony integration. From three participants to three thousand, EventCenter makes WebRTC- and SIP-compatible audio/video conferencing scalable, efficient and truly cross-platform.

EventCenter provides unparalleled flexibility to combine P2P-, SFU-, and MCU-based media flows in a single session and switch dynamically while the session is live.
